Title: Implements a students' bill of rights for state university of New York and city university of New York institutions
Summary: Implements a students' bill of rights for state university of New York and city university of New York institutions to guarantee certain rights to students at such institutions.
LawCode: Add Art 129-C ยง6450, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to implementing a students' bill of rights for state university of New York and city university of New York institutions
